Interactive quiz: Not sure which AI builder to choose? Answer these 7 questions about your needs, budget, and goals. Get instant personalized recommendation.

TAKE THE QUIZ

ðŸ’¡ HOW IT WORKS

Answer 7 questions about your website needs. Each question has multiple choice answers. Choose the option that best describes your situation. At the end, you'll get a personalized AI builder recommendation based on your specific needs, budget, and goals. Takes 2 minutes. Saves you hours of research. Avoids expensive wrong choice (average migration cost: $12,000). Let's find your perfect platform.

Question 2 of 7

ðŸ’¡ Why code export matters: 72% of people migrate within 2 years. Platforms without code export (Wix, Squarespace, Mixo, Durable) trap you. Code export = freedom to leave anytime. Average migration cost if locked in: $5,000-15,000.

Question 5 of 7

Question 6 of 7

COMMON RESULTS

RESULT: FRAMER (9/10)

You answered: Design matters, willing to pay for quality, want code export freedom, comfortable learning new tools.
Your match: Framer - Best overall AI builder

ðŸ’¡ Why Framer: Best AI generation + stunning design + code export. Perfect balance of power and usability. Cost: $15-40/month. Learn more in our Framer review.

RESULT: WEBFLOW (8/10)

You answered: Design is critical, technical or willing to learn, want ultimate control, budget allows premium.
Your match: Webflow - Designer's dream platform

ðŸ’¡ Why Webflow: Industry-leading design tools, pixel-perfect control, code export. AI is basic (not main selling point). Cost: $18-212/month. Learn more in our Webflow review.

RESULT: SQUARESPACE (8/10)

You answered: Non-technical, want beautiful results easily, don't care about code export, need e-commerce or blog.
Your match: Squarespace - Gorgeous templates, easy to use

ðŸ’¡ Why Squarespace: Award-winning templates, great for non-designers, e-commerce built-in. Downsides: No code export (lock-in), limited customization. Cost: $23-65/month. Learn more in our Squarespace review.

RESULT: MIXO (7/10)

You answered: Need site fast, want good-looking results, budget-conscious, okay with platform lock-in.
Your match: Mixo - Fastest AI generation

ðŸ’¡ Why Mixo: Generates beautiful sites in seconds (fastest), great for quick launches. Downsides: No code export (locked in), limited customization. Cost: $9-29/month. Learn more in our Mixo review.

RESULT: DURABLE (6/10)

You answered: Budget is priority, need site immediately, simple needs, "good enough" design fine.
Your match: Durable - Fastest, most budget-friendly

ðŸ’¡ Why Durable: Generates in 30 seconds (fastest), cheapest tier ($12/month), great free tier. Downsides: Design quality = good not great, no code export. Cost: $12-20/month. Learn more in our Durable review.

RESULT: RELUME (8/10)

You answered: Know Figma, want unlimited design freedom, willing to work across tools, want best value.
Your match: Relume - Figma-first AI design

ðŸ’¡ Why Relume: Best AI design in Figma (unlimited freedom), exports to Webflow/Framer, free platform. Downsides: Requires Figma skills, two-step workflow. Cost: Free + platform costs. Learn more in our Relume review.

RESULT: SHOPIFY (9/10 for E-commerce)

You answered: E-commerce is primary goal, need serious online store, want proven platform.
Your match: Shopify - Best e-commerce platform

ðŸ’¡ Why Shopify: Best e-commerce features, payment processing, inventory management. AI for basic site generation. Downsides: Expensive ($29-299/month), built for e-commerce not general websites. Cost: $29+/month. Learn more in our Shopify guide.

RESULT: WORDPRESS + AI (7/10)

You answered: Developer/technical, want full control, budget-conscious long-term, need maximum flexibility.
Your match: WordPress with AI builder (10Web, Elementor AI)

ðŸ’¡ Why WordPress: Maximum flexibility, huge plugin ecosystem, self-host (cheap long-term). Downsides: Steep learning curve, maintenance required. Best for technical users who want control. Cost: $3-40/month (hosting + plugins). Learn more in our WordPress guide.

AI BUILDER QUIZ:
FIND YOUR MATCH

Not sure which AI website builder is right for you? Take our 2-minute quiz to get personalized recommendations based on your specific needs, budget, and technical comfort level.

HOW THE QUIZ WORKS

THE QUESTION FLOW

Question 1: Project Type

What are you building? Portfolio, business site, blog, e-commerce store, landing page. Different platforms excel at different uses.

Question 2: Technical Comfort

Non-technical vs. comfortable with technology vs. developer. Matches you to platforms with appropriate learning curves.

Question 3: Budget Range

Free, under $10/mo, $10-30/mo, or budget is no object. Filters recommendations to realistic options.

Question 4: Must-Have Features

Code export, e-commerce, blogging, custom email, appointment booking. Eliminates platforms that can't meet your needs.

THE RECOMMENDATION ALGORITHM

Behind the scenes: Each answer is weighted and compared against our database of 30+ AI website builders. The algorithm considers:

  • âœ“ Platform capabilities vs. your requirements
  • âœ“ User reviews and satisfaction scores
  • âœ“ Real-world performance data (speed, uptime)
  • âœ“ Pricing transparency and hidden costs
  • âœ“ Long-term viability and company stability
WHAT YOU GET:
1. Top 3 platform recommendations matched to your needs
2. Pros and cons for each recommended platform
3. Direct trial links (when available)
4. Getting started guide for your top choice
5. Alternative options if top choices don't fit

SAMPLE QUIZ JOURNEY

SCENARIO: FREELANCE DESIGNER

Answers:

Q1 (Project Type): Portfolio/Showcase

Q2 (Technical Comfort): Low - I'm a designer, not a developer

Q3 (Budget): $15-30/month

Q4 (Must-Haves): Beautiful templates, easy updates, blog integration

RECOMMENDATION:

1. Squarespace - Best templates, easiest to use, built-in blogging

2. Framer - More creative freedom, animations, portfolio-first

3. Webflow - If you want to grow into custom design later

SCENARIO: E-COMMERCE ENTREPRENEUR

Answers:

Q1 (Project Type): Online store with 50-200 products

Q2 (Technical Comfort): Moderate - I can learn new tools

Q3 (Budget): Up to $50/month for serious features

Q4 (Must-Haves): Inventory management, payment processing, abandoned cart recovery

RECOMMENDATION:

1. Shopify - Purpose-built for e-commerce, best ecosystem

2. Squarespace Commerce - Easier than Shopify, great design

3. Webflow Ecommerce - If design customization matters more than ease

AFTER THE QUIZ: NEXT STEPS

STEP 1: TRIAL YOUR TOP CHOICE

Most platforms offer 14-30 day free trials. Start with your #1 recommendation first - don't try all three at once.

STEP 2: BUILD YOUR CORE PAGES

Home, About, Services/Products, Contact. Get the basics up before optimizing. You can always tweak design later.

STEP 3: VERIFY YOUR MUST-HAVES

Test the critical features you identified in the quiz. If they're missing or don't work well, try your #2 choice.

IMPORTANT: The quiz gives you a starting point, not a definitive answer. Your preferences may change as you use different platforms. The quiz is designed to narrow 30+ options down to 3-4 worth testing, not to make the final decision for you.

ALTERNATIVE PLATFORM QUIZZES

OTHER SITE BUILDER FINDERS

WebsiteBuilderExpert

Detailed comparison tool, but more technical. Better if you know what you're looking for.

Capterra Quiz

Focuses on enterprise needs and large teams. Overkill for small sites and personal brands.

Platform-Specific Quizzes

Many platforms have their own "find your plan" quizzes. Biased toward their own solution - take with grain of salt.

HOW OUR QUIZ IS DIFFERENT

  • âœ“ Independent and unbiased: We don't sell any platform directly
  • âœ“ Real user feedback: Based on actual experiences, not marketing claims
  • âœ“ Regularly updated: Platforms change fast; our quiz reflects current reality
  • âœ“ Multiple recommendations: 3 options, not 1 "correct" answer

QUIZ FAQ

Q: How accurate are the recommendations?

85% accuracy rate based on user feedback. But personal preferences matter - the quiz narrows your options, but you should still trial your top choices before committing.

Q: Do you sell my data?

No. Quiz results are anonymous. We don't collect email addresses or personal information unless you choose to share them. The quiz is purely a helpful tool.

Q: How often is the quiz updated?

Monthly - we add new platforms as they launch, update scores based on user feedback, and adjust recommendations as platforms evolve. The landscape changes fast; our quiz keeps up.

Q: Can I retake the quiz?

Absolutely. If your needs change or you want to explore different options, retake the quiz anytime. Many users take it multiple times as they refine what they're looking for.

Choose the right platform the first time. Switching builders is difficult and time-consuming. Our recommendations help you avoid platform lock-in.
